it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment

Class DataExperimenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment.DataExperimenter

  • public class DataExperimenter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class fulfills all the responsibilities that concern the configuration and the performing of a weka experiment, either the standard and the customized one;

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataExperimenter(java.util.List<weka.classifiers.Classifier> classifiers, DatasetHandler dataset)
      The constructor that could be used if you want to specify just one dataset
      DataExperimenter(java.util.List<weka.classifiers.Classifier> classifiers, DatasetHandler dataset, java.lang.String pathForResult)
      The constructor that could be used if you want to specify just one dataset and that allow to specify the path where the experiment statistics and result will be saved.
      DataExperimenter(java.util.List<weka.classifiers.Classifier> classifiers, javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.io.File> datasets)
      The constructor that have to be used to specify more then one datasets to analyze.
      DataExperimenter(java.util.List<weka.classifiers.Classifier> classifiers, javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.io.File> datasets, java.lang.String pathForResult)
      The constructor that have to be used to specify more then one datasets to analyze, and that allow to specify the path where the experiment statistics and result will be saved.

        classifiers - the list of the classifiers that have to be analyze

      • experiment

        public java.lang.String experiment(java.lang.String exptype,
                                   java.lang.String splittype,
                                   int folds,
                                   boolean randomized,
                                   double percentage,
                                   int runs)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a standard weka experiment
        Parameters:
        exptype - the type of experiment: classification or regression
        splittype - the type of split: crossvalidation or randomsplit
        folds - number of fold used by the cross validation
        percentage - how many instances has to used for the creation of the training set in the randomsplit
        randomized - if the instances used for the creating the training and testing set in the randomsplit has to be randomized first
        runs - how many times the the split has to be repeted
        Returns:
        the result of the experiment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
